text: Karma (Xuân Cao Mạnh) is a superheroine appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. Created by Chris Claremont and Frank Miller, the character first appeared in Marvel Team-Up #100 (December 1980). She is mostly in association with The X-Men. ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * Karma at Marvel.com Category:Fictional lesbians Category:Marvel Comics superheroes Category:Marvel Comics mutants
title: Karma (character)
